metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3925 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: server/wifi/anqp/ANQPFactory.java in Android 6.x before 2016-10-01 and 7.0 before 2016-10-01 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (blocked Wi-Fi usage) via a crafted application, aka internal bug 30230534.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
